DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to prove the bioequivalence of Anastrozole Tablet under fed conditions
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalency Study of Anastrozole 1 mg Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to anastrozole or any comparable or similar product.
